name: MIS Total Pay per Activity
description:
Presents total pay per Activities for a date range.

FIN0081 - v00.00.01 Last Modified: 05/09/2019

dataset.name: MIS Load Log
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Finance
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.PAY_TYPE_CODE = 'SESSION' THEN 'Session' ELSE AT_PAY_TYPE_CODES.DESCRIPTION END AS TRANSACTION_DETAILS_PAY_TYPE40, SUM(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.PAY_AMOUNT) AS TRANSACTION_DETAILS_PAY_AMOUNT, SUM(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.PIECE_WORK) AS TRANSACTION_DETAILS_PIECE_WORK, SUM(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.BONUS_PAY) AS TRANSACTION_DETAILS_BONUS_PAY, AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE, CASE WHEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.PAY_TYPE_CODE = 'SESSION' THEN AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE_FOTD.DESCRIPTION ELSE AT_PAY_TYPE_CODES.DESCRIPTION END AS TRANSACTION_DETAILS_PAY_DESC35, AT_CASELOADS.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION, BODIMIS.DIM_REFERENCE_CODES AT_PAY_TYPE_CODES, BODIMIS.DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE_FOTD, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_CASELOADS, BODIMIS.DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE, BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL, BODIMIS.DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DIM_DATE_TRANSACTIONS WHERE (AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK = AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_DIM_DATE_TRANSACTIONS.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DATE_SK) AND (AT_CASELOADS.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ID = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.TXN_ID (+) AND AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_SEQ = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.TXN_ENTRY_SEQ (+)) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.PAY_TYPE_CODE = AT_PAY_TYPE_CODES.CODE (+)) AND (AT_PAY_TYPE_CODES.CODE_DOMAIN (+) = 'PAY_TYPE') AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.PROGRAMME_TYPE_SK = AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE_FOTD.PROGRAMME_TYPE_SK (+)) AND (AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.DESCRIPTION = 'Offender Payroll' AND AT_DIM_DATE_TRANSACTIONS.DAY_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('26-08-2019 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('02-09-2019 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND ((AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE) = 'CR') AND (AT_CASELOADS.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)))) GROUP BY AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.PAY_TYPE_CODE = 'SESSION' THEN 'Session' ELSE AT_PAY_TYPE_CODES.DESCRIPTION END, AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE, CASE WHEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.PAY_TYPE_CODE = 'SESSION' THEN AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE_FOTD.DESCRIPTION ELSE AT_PAY_TYPE_CODES.DESCRIPTION END, AT_CASELOADS.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK), dataset_ AS (SELECT DESCRIPTION, TRANSACTION_DETAILS_PAY_TYPE40, TRANSACTION_DETAILS_PAY_AMOUNT, TRANSACTION_DETAILS_PIECE_WORK, TRANSACTION_DETAILS_BONUS_PAY, TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE, TRANSACTION_DETAILS_PAY_DESC35, ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK FROM dataset_base_)
